definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: One in 3 domestic passengers chooses China Southern Airlines on average.
sentences.chinese: 中国平均每3个民航旅客就有1个选择南航。

sentences.english: On the whole, average weekly hours are far below their pre-recession level.
sentences.chinese: 整体而言，周平均工作时间比起衰退前大幅下滑。

sentences.english: For fatal cases, the course of illness takes an average of two days.
sentences.chinese: 就死亡病例而言，病程平均两天。

sentences.english: Global average temperature records are vital to understanding how the climate is changing.
sentences.chinese: 全球平均气温纪录对认识气候变化的过程至关重要。

sentences.english: The seasonal sea level change is of annual period and the second oscillation is of semi-annual period.
sentences.chinese: 月平均海面以年周期振动为主，其次是半年周期。

sentences.english: On average, Habbos users spend about 39 minutes per visit to the site.
sentences.chinese: 平均来说，哈宝用户每次花上39分钟来浏览网站。
一个泌乳期的正常泌乳量平均为2015。

sentences.english: Is in the profession or other similar organization's average human resource flow level.
sentences.chinese: 就是所在行业或其他同类组织的平均人才流动水平。

sentences.english: The average height (at the shoulder) of a gray wolf is 26 to 32 inches.
sentences.chinese: 它们的平均高度都在26到32英寸之间。

sentences.english: Aboriginal Australians live on average seventeen fewer years than white Australians.
sentences.chinese: 原住澳大利亚人比白种加拿大人平均少活17年左右。

sentences.english: The method to analyze the pressure gradient with mean radial velocity is used.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了利用平均径向速度分析压力梯度的方法。

sentences.english: In the final exams, his average grade was above 90 points.
sentences.chinese: 他在期终考试中，科第成绩平均都在90分。

sentences.english: The company's production from the 22 producing concessions last year totaled over 51, 000 barrels of oil equivalent per day.
sentences.chinese: 公司去年22个产区平均每天产5万一千桶石油。

sentences.english: On average throughout all the quarter-million responses, minds were wandering 47 percent of the time.
sentences.chinese: 在25万回应中，平均下来思绪47%的时间在游荡。

sentences.english: Where should the mean be now?
sentences.chinese: 现在的平均值会是多少？

sentences.english: Female tigers in the wild can live up to 15 years averagely.
sentences.chinese: 野生雌虎的寿命大约是15年，平均能产下5窝虎仔。

definition: to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
Gundam, Japanese animation franchise/Jean-Luc Godard (1930-), French-Swiss film director
